description: Weekly practical lab classes assessing core skills (hurdle requirement) and non-core skills through lab book questions. Involves data analysis, safe practices, and linking experiments to theory.

9 online quizzes testing fundamental principles from weekly topics. Best 7 marks counted. Includes 3 attempts per quiz with feedback. Covers organic/inorganic chemistry, stereochemistry, and reaction mechanisms.
Two in-person tests (Week 5 and Week 9) covering topics 1-4 and 5-8 respectively. Includes MCQ, numerical, and short-answer questions. Feedback provided on learning outcomes for incorrect answers.
Comprehensive online exam covering all course content. 2 hours 10 minutes duration with MCQ, chemical mechanism diagrams, and short answers. Requires chemDoodle software for drawing responses.
